name: PSweet
description:
Welcome to PVillage, home of the PSuite set of productivity applications. Here you'll learn everything you need to know about the world's greatest, most fun home office software. How? By dating them, silly! Experience a hand-drawn, computer-pixellated world of retro 90s weirdness as you meet, mingle, and manage your schedule to maximize your FUN!

Features:


  • 7 different datable characters with over 30,000 words of lovingly-written dialog
  • Original, hand-drawn art, pixellated for a juicy, crunchy, mid-90s look
  • All new calendar mechanic for you to schedule your dates and maximize your romantic productivity
  • Your own virtual assistant, A1 the spreadsheet cell
  • A wide, deep lore that you probably weren't prepared for in any meaningful way
  • CAREFULLY BALANCED LEVELS OF [FUN]

Ok but really,


PSweet is a visual novel done in the style of 90s shovelware promotional material for a fictional operating system. It's a part of the wider Future Proof universe, which we've been producing online, and at live events in NYC since 2017. Read more about why we made the game here: https://medium.com/future-proof-productions/why-an-immersive-theatre-company-decided-to-make-a-videogame-c9244560c9a1
